teststorydesc: Several days after transmission of updated information, it was discovered that a more complete medical record exists for Javier under a different SSN. It becomes necessary to send a retraction of the previous report. The cancellation record for Javier Smith is transmitted via an ADT^A11 message from the EHR to the jurisdictional vital records office.
preCondition: A04-Report message is sent before the A11-Cancel message.
testObjectives: This test case examines the ability of an EHR to create an ADT A11 message for cancellation of relevant clinical information to the Electronic Death Registration System (EDRS).
